location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Augustus Grant, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 10 January 1803, James Augustus Grant, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, informs Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, of the appointment of Jonathan Henry Lovett as Resident at Bushire and instructs Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun to deliver over charge of the Residency to Lovett upon his arrival.
